Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-44998 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.51.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-44998 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.51.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.51.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-44998
